title: The shepardes kalender Here beginneth the kalender of shepardes newly augmented and corrected.
author: Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547, attributed name.
publisher: By Thomas Este for Iohn Wally,
notes: A translation and revision (by Robert Copland?) of: Le compost et kalendrier des bergiers.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Leaves G3-5 possibly from another copy--Folger Shakespeare Library catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
